OM_Shadowheart_ACM_AOM_OOM.synopsis: When Shadowheart enters the Shar Temple for the first time Shar speaks to her. Shar wants Shadowheart to find the Spear of Night and use it to kill Nightsong. Shar will tell Shadowheart where to find the spear.
OM_Shadowheart_ACM_AOM_OOM.how_to_trigger: Enter the Shar Temple with Shadowheart

OM_Shadowheart_COM.synopsis: When Shadowheart enters the Shar Temple for the first time Shar speaks to her. Shar wants Shadowheart to find the Spear of Night and use it to kill Nightsong. Shar will tell Shadowheart where to find the spear.
OM_Shadowheart_COM.how_to_trigger: Enter the Shar Temple with Shadowheart

OM_Shadowheart_ACM_AOM_OOM_0.speaker: Narrator
OM_Shadowheart_ACM_AOM_OOM_0.text: *The very air around you seems to quiver and cool, as if disturbed by some presence - an invisible, formless, welcoming presence.*

OM_Shadowheart_ACM_AOM_OOM_28.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_Shadowheart_ACM_AOM_OOM_28.text: I won't fail you, my Lady.

OM_Shadowheart_ACM_AOM_OOM_17.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_Shadowheart_ACM_AOM_OOM_17.text: Quiet - this is some trick. The parasite, toying with my mind. Stop it.

OM_Shadowheart_ACM_AOM_OOM_27.speaker: Player
OM_Shadowheart_ACM_AOM_OOM_27.text: Why are you muttering to yourself?

OM_Shadowheart_ACM_AOM_OOM_22.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_Shadowheart_ACM_AOM_OOM_22.text: Shar. She spoke to me. I have to find a sacred spear and make a sacrifice in her name.

OM_Shadowheart_ACM_AOM_OOM_23.speaker: Player
OM_Shadowheart_ACM_AOM_OOM_23.text: I doubt you'll find much to sacrifice in this place. Let's keep focused.

OM_Shadowheart_ACM_AOM_OOM_14.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_Shadowheart_ACM_AOM_OOM_14.text: It's nothing. I just got lost in my own thoughts.

OM_Shadowheart_ACM_AOM_OOM_11.speaker: Player
OM_Shadowheart_ACM_AOM_OOM_11.text: Keep focused - this is hardly the place for daydreaming.

OM_Shadowheart_ACM_AOM_OOM_54.speaker: Narrator
OM_Shadowheart_ACM_AOM_OOM_54.text: *The very air around you seems to quiver and cool, as if disturbed by some presence - an invisible, formless, welcoming presence.*

OM_Shadowheart_ACM_AOM_OOM_16.speaker: Shar
OM_Shadowheart_ACM_AOM_OOM_16.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart glances around in surprise at the disembodied voice speaking to her.

OM_Shadowheart_ACM_AOM_OOM_6.speaker: Shar
OM_Shadowheart_ACM_AOM_OOM_6.text: You know me, just as I know you, Shadowheart. I am with you always - in your thoughts, your deeds, in your dreams.

OM_Shadowheart_ACM_AOM_OOM_25.speaker: Shar
OM_Shadowheart_ACM_AOM_OOM_25.text: I am here for you. And I hope you are here for me.

OM_Shadowheart_ACM_AOM_OOM_32.speaker: Shar
OM_Shadowheart_ACM_AOM_OOM_32.text: Indeed. Welcome. It has been a long road to bring you back to me. But there is more I need of you. Listen closely:

OM_Shadowheart_ACM_AOM_OOM_26.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_Shadowheart_ACM_AOM_OOM_26.text: Quiet - this is some trick. The parasite, toying with my mind. Stop it.

OM_Shadowheart_ACM_AOM_OOM_35.speaker: Shar
OM_Shadowheart_ACM_AOM_OOM_35.text: You are wise to show caution, but this is nothing to do with the foulness lurking in your head. I am real, and I am here for you. Now listen carefully:

OM_Shadowheart_ACM_AOM_OOM_2.speaker: Shar
OM_Shadowheart_ACM_AOM_OOM_2.text: As I knew you would. You have been loyal and steadfast, even when you doubted yourself. Now listen carefully:

OM_Shadowheart_ACM_AOM_OOM_50.speaker: Shar
OM_Shadowheart_ACM_AOM_OOM_50.text: This is my sacred proving ground. This is where you shall show me just how much you love me. Then I can embrace you, elevate you, reveal to you your true purpose.

OM_Shadowheart_ACM_AOM_OOM_34.speaker: Shar
OM_Shadowheart_ACM_AOM_OOM_34.text: Like the Dark Justiciars of old, you must journey to my innermost sanctum and make a sacrifice in my name. You will become my Voice made flesh, to command all who bow to me.

OM_Shadowheart_ACM_AOM_OOM_18.speaker: Shar
OM_Shadowheart_ACM_AOM_OOM_18.text: Already, you have the Spear of Night. Wield it to make the sacrifice.

OM_Shadowheart_ACM_AOM_OOM_52.speaker: Shar
OM_Shadowheart_ACM_AOM_OOM_52.text: You are ready. You were born for this. Now, forth - make me proud.

OM_Shadowheart_ACM_AOM_OOM_43.speaker: Shar
OM_Shadowheart_ACM_AOM_OOM_43.text: Seek out the library. It houses more than just knowledge. Find the Spear of Night. Wield it to make your sacrifice.

OM_Shadowheart_ACM_AOM_OOM_15.speaker: Shar
OM_Shadowheart_ACM_AOM_OOM_15.text: Peace, Shadowheart. You know who it is that speaks to you. I wish you no harm. I wish only to offer my embrace.

OM_Shadowheart_ACM_AOM_OOM_46.speaker: Shar
OM_Shadowheart_ACM_AOM_OOM_46.text: You keep your silence, your composure - good. This is why I come to you alone, Shadowheart. Only you can help me.

OM_Shadowheart_COM_46.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_Shadowheart_COM_46.context: CinematicNodeContext: SH pauses, sensing something. She closes her eyes, concentratingInternalNodeContext: Uses the same branch as the ACM but without the Inclusion nodesNodeContext: Hesitant, as if she's not sure the player actually said anything.

OM_Shadowheart_COM_35.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_Shadowheart_COM_35.context: CinematicNodeContext: Long pause before answering, as if listening to something. Finally opens her eyes and speaksNodeContext: Pleased/tinged with awe. She feels a presence, and hears its voice. (though the player themselves do not hear it)

OM_Shadowheart_COM_26.speaker: Player
OM_Shadowheart_COM_26.text: This isn't another of your 'episodes', is it?

OM_Shadowheart_COM_3.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_Shadowheart_COM_3.text: No. This is different... very different.
OM_Shadowheart_COM_3.context: CinematicNodeContext: Long pause before answering, as if listening to something. Finally opens her eyes and speaksNodeContext: Pleased/tinged with awe. She feels a presence, and hears its voice. (though the player themselves do not hear it)

OM_Shadowheart_COM_15.speaker: Narrator
OM_Shadowheart_COM_15.text: *You detect the gentlest of presences disturbing the temple's ancient, stale air. It seems to encircle Shadowheart, welcoming her.*

OM_Shadowheart_COM_29.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_Shadowheart_COM_29.text: It's fine, really. I just feel we're on the right track. I'm right where I need to be - under Lady Shar's gaze.

OM_Shadowheart_COM_4.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_Shadowheart_COM_4.text: There's something more I need to do, or the trials will have been in vain.

OM_Shadowheart_COM_38.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_Shadowheart_COM_38.text: There is a holy weapon hidden away - the Spear of Night. I have to claim it, then use it to make a sacrifice in Lady Shar's inner sanctum. If I succeed, I'll become a Dark Justiciar.
OM_Shadowheart_COM_38.context: NodeContext: Excited, getting a little worked up.

OM_Shadowheart_COM_17.speaker: Player
OM_Shadowheart_COM_17.text: A sacrifice? You intend to kill some innocent down here?

OM_Shadowheart_COM_6.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_Shadowheart_COM_6.text: Don't worry. This place has been empty for years - the sacrifice can't be a simple mortal. More likely it's a monster - and we're well-versed in dealing with those, aren't we?

OM_Shadowheart_COM_45.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_Shadowheart_COM_45.text: Don't go soft on me now - this is hardly the first life we've taken. Besides, this place has been empty for years - the sacrifice can't be a simple mortal. More likely a monster.

OM_Shadowheart_COM_39.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_Shadowheart_COM_39.text: As luck would have it, we have the spear already. Time to move on.

OM_Shadowheart_COM_21.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_Shadowheart_COM_21.text: We need to find that spear.

OM_Shadowheart_COM_43.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_Shadowheart_COM_43.text: We need to get that spear - supposedly it's in the library we saw before.
OM_Shadowheart_COM_43.context: InternalNodeContext: Flagged impossible for now until the correct flag for entering the library is available.

OM_Shadowheart_COM_33.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_Shadowheart_COM_33.text: We need to get that spear - there's a library in this place somewhere. That's where I need to look.

OM_Shadowheart_COM_41.speaker: Player
OM_Shadowheart_COM_41.text: You're not going to turn against me, are you?

OM_Shadowheart_COM_40.speaker: Player
OM_Shadowheart_COM_40.text: You really want to go through with this? A blood sacrifice just to appease Shar?

OM_Shadowheart_COM_25.speaker: Player
OM_Shadowheart_COM_25.text: All right. Where is this spear?

OM_Shadowheart_COM_12.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_Shadowheart_COM_12.text: Supposedly in the library we saw before - we should go back to it.
OM_Shadowheart_COM_12.context: InternalNodeContext: Flagged impossible for now until the correct flag for entering the library is available.

OM_Shadowheart_COM_28.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_Shadowheart_COM_28.text: Without it, the sacrifice to my Lady will be in vain, and I won't be blessed as a Dark Justiciar.

OM_Shadowheart_COM_32.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_Shadowheart_COM_32.text: There's a library in this place somewhere. That's where I need to look.

OM_Shadowheart_COM_47.speaker: Player
OM_Shadowheart_COM_47.text: And you just figured this out by yourself, just now?
OM_Shadowheart_COM_47.context: InternalNodeContext: This QN only if the player failed a passive check earlier in the dialogue.

OM_Shadowheart_COM_10.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_Shadowheart_COM_10.text: Yes. I know it must seem like I pulled this out of thin air, but that's how Lady Shar chose to reveal herself to me. You'll see for yourself, soon enough.
OM_Shadowheart_COM_10.context: InternalNodeContext: SH approves of player for at least 30NodeContext: Earnest.

OM_Shadowheart_COM_24.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_Shadowheart_COM_24.text: Spare me the scepticism - she said it was my special purpose, for my ears alone. You'll see for yourself, soon enough.

OM_Shadowheart_COM_31.speaker: Player
OM_Shadowheart_COM_31.text: This is nonsense - we've already cleared the way forward.

OM_Shadowheart_COM_36.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_Shadowheart_COM_36.text: The way forward will be of little importance if I don't fulfil my mission. If you've any sense, you'll help me.

OM_Shadowheart_COM_14.speaker: Player
OM_Shadowheart_COM_14.text: If the Nightsinger has called upon you, then I will do whatever I can to help.

OM_Shadowheart_COM_27.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_Shadowheart_COM_27.text: Thank you, kin. I'll remember your help, if I succeed. As will my Lady.

OM_Shadowheart_COM_2.speaker: Player
OM_Shadowheart_COM_2.text: Let's move on. Perhaps this mission will prove real - or not.

OM_Shadowheart_COM_34.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_Shadowheart_COM_34.text: It's real. I felt her presence - I heard her voice. You'll see for yourself, soon enough.

OM_Shadowheart_COM_42.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_Shadowheart_COM_42.text: It's fine. But we're on the right path. I'm right where I need to be - under Lady Shar's gaze.

OM_Shadowheart_COM_44.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_Shadowheart_COM_44.text: You don't understand. There's something I need to do, or the trials will have been in vain.
OM_Shadowheart_COM_44.context: NodeContext: Elated, brushing off the player's reprimand.

OM_Shadowheart_COM_37.speaker: Player
OM_Shadowheart_COM_37.text: I felt something - a presence. What was it?
OM_Shadowheart_COM_37.context: InternalNodeContext: This QN only if the previous passive check was succeeded

OM_Shadowheart_COM_49.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_Shadowheart_COM_49.text: Lady Shar's presence. I felt her too - we're right where we need to be, under her gaze. This is the right path - let's continue.

OM_Shadowheart_COM_18.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_Shadowheart_COM_18.text: My lady. Shar. You may have felt her, but I heard her. She gave me a mission.

OM_Shadowheart_COM_8.speaker: Player
OM_Shadowheart_COM_8.text: It's Lady Shar, isn't it? I felt her presence.
OM_Shadowheart_COM_8.context: InternalNodeContext: This QN only if the previous passive check was succeeded

OM_Shadowheart_COM_20.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_Shadowheart_COM_20.text: Yes, we're right where we need to be, under her gaze. This is the right path - let's continue.

OM_Shadowheart_COM_0.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_Shadowheart_COM_0.text: None other. She spoke to me - she actually spoke to me! And she gave me a mission.
